celestial-anonymous:
Label for anonymous (not logged in) user menu
{{Identical|Anonymous}}
celestial-loggedinas:
Note for personal menu for logged in users noting their current username

Parameters:
* $1 - username
celestial-notloggedin:
Note for personal menu for anonymous users clarifying that they are not logged in
{{Identical|Not logged in}}
celestial-userpage:
User page/profile link label in the personal menu
{{Identical|User page}}
Parameters:
* $1 - username, used for GENDER
celestial-talkpage:
Talk page link label in the personal menu.
Parameters:
* $1 - username, used for GENDER
celestial-pagelog: Label for Special:Log link for the page. The page is singular.
celestial-more:
Label for the more tools dropdown menu in the page actions toolbar
{{Identical|More}}
celestial-sitetools: Label for general site tools menu in sidebar
celestial-userpagetools: Label for actions associated with a userpage
celestial-action-addsection: Label for newsection link on talkpages
celestial-view-view:
Label for the 'view' link action tab
{{Identical|Read}}
celestial-namespaces:
Label for page namespaces and watch tools
{{Identical|Namespace}}
celestial-languages:
Label for the other languages dropdown
{{Identical|Language}}
celestial-projects: Label for the other projects dropdown
celestial.css:
{{optional}}
CSS applied to users using Timeless skin.
celestial.js:
{{optional}}
JS for users using Timeless skin.
